name: clerence
description:
A flash program covering what follows trauma and the beginning to come to terms with one’s true nature.

A previous bloody incident is thought back on while the slight chaos of present day slowly unfolds in front of Slate Clerence, a “schlo” born into a privileged family. A rather subtle look at attempts of self modification, forgiveness and recovery.

Project may technically serve as a prequel to “what is schlo?”, as this project involves characters and events referenced in that game; though it could very well stand as its own independent work.

Potential triggers: mutual rejection of incestual values, mention of violence, blood
